definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) little grebe (Tachybaptus ruficollis)
(bird species of China) horned grebe (Podiceps auritus)
(bird species of China) red-necked grebe (Podiceps grisegena)
(bird species of China) great crested grebe (Podiceps cristatus)
variant of 鷿鷈|䴙䴘[pi4 ti1]
variant of 鷿鷈|䴙䴘[pi4 ti1]
(bird species of China) black-necked grebe (Podiceps nigricollis)

sentences.english: And so we were rowing, and one of these Western Grebes came along.
sentences.chinese: 当我们在划船的时候，来了一只北美鹓䴘。

sentences.english: The grebes are joined by the highest flying birds in the world.
sentences.chinese: 除了䴙䴘，这里还有世界上飞的最高的鸟。

sentences.english: And one of these Grebes came along while we were rowing.
sentences.chinese: 我们划船的时候，来了一只北美鹓䴘。

sentences.english: And so we were rowing and one of these Western Grebes came along.
sentences.chinese: 当咱们在划船的时候，来了一只北美鹓䴘。
